title: Non-Deterministic Search

definitions.Non-Deterministic: A type of search algorithm that does not guarantee to find the best solution, but rather explores multiple possible solutions.
definitions.Search Algorithm: A method for finding a solution to a problem by systematically searching among all possible solutions.

summary: The slide presents the concept of Non-Deterministic Search, explaining it as a search algorithm that explores multiple possible solutions without guaranteeing the best one. It includes a visual metaphor of an astronaut in a dangerous situation, symbolizing the exploration and uncertainty involved in such searches.
